messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschoolers in tennessee
messages.msgSnippet: thanks Windi but Memphis is about 300 miles southwest of us. Johanna ... From: windiwilloe@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, March
messages.messageBody:
thanks Windi but Memphis is about 300 miles southwest of us.
Johanna
 
----- Original Message -----
From: windiwilloe@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, March 15, 2001 5:34 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschoolers in tennessee

In a message dated 3/14/01 11:05:56 PM Central Standard Time,
saninocencio1@... writes:

<< Are there any unschoolers on this list who live in Tennessee on the
Cumberland Plateau?Sometimes I feel like I am the only one around here. I
really appreciate this group. I am reading John Holt's Teach Your Own for the
first time this week. It has been so enlightnening!
Johanna
Children don't interrupt my work,
Children are my work!
  >>

Hi Johanna,

I don't know if this will be helpful or not but thought I would send it your
way. I don't live in TN but have a friend who does.

Windi

<A HREF="http://www.geocities.com/unschoolersofmemphis/">Unschoolers of
Memphis website</A>

messages.subject: unschoolers in tennessee
messages.msgSnippet: Are there any unschoolers on this list who live in Tennessee on the Cumberland Plateau?Sometimes I feel like I am the only one around here. I really appreciate
messages.messageBody:
Are there any unschoolers on this list who live in Tennessee on the Cumberland Plateau?Sometimes I feel like I am the only one around here. I really appreciate this group. I am reading John Holt's Teach Your Own for the first time this week. It has been so enlightnening!
Johanna
Children don't interrupt my work,
Children are my work!
